channel.title: MAPBACK 0... Help?
channel.description: Well I'm updating my gameframe to the current runescape, but I don't know how to change the mapback. I know there is a tut on rune~server, but its down =[

item.title: MAPBACK 0... Help?
item.dc:creator: @GalkonsPride GalkonsPride
item.description:
@GalkonsPride wrote:

My server isn’t leeched dude wtf… Its base was cleaned satans isle… Thats it.

But yea thanks m.dog. I can’t get on rune~server for some reason…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2008, 11:15:53 PM[/size][hr]FFS it didn’t work…

@ryanandmatt wrote:

GalkonsPride:

You don’t get it… You’re just a leecher. I’ve seen you leech mine and IceMan’s client. To actually change the mapback you gotta do something. Idk what it is.

falkon no offense but wasnt ur first server leeched
yes
even iceman said it untill u guys became buds
none of ur other amazin work is leeched though

item.title: MAPBACK 0... Help?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

cocoa:

You could copy paste from another server…

Mapback is client not server dumbfuck.

Oh and

[QUOTE=Impulser;384952]Well because Llama and I got the mapback working we had released it to some people, One of those people releasd it and TX Got it, I have nothing against TX cough Leeching Noob cough who released it open source but luckily i did not add the proper mapback…

Anyways here is the tutorial: (Please note, if you don’t know how to declare stuff You are an idiot, I hate idiots!)

Please note all this is in the [COLOR=Red]Client Class[/COLOR]

Declare This:

private Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 CustomMapback;Now under the Nullifier Method ([COLOR=YellowGreen]Method8[/COLOR]) Add:

CustomMapback = null;Now Under the DrawMinimap Method (Method79), Find “aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_1197.method361(0, 16083, 0);” and Replace it with “CustomMapback.method348(0, 16083, 0);”

Now Under the Startup Method ([COLOR=YellowGreen]Method6[/COLOR]) Find “method13(80, (byte)4, “Unpacking Media”);”

and where it says “aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_1197 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2(class44_2, “mapback”, 0);” Declare a new sprite with this code:

CustomMapback = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(class44_2, "mapback", 0);Now, This part is only if you have a diffrent mapback, than the 317 mapback!

Find the MinimapDrawing Method ([COLOR=YellowGreen]Method141[/COLOR]) and you will see:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method354(aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_1197, false, 83 - l1 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1445 / 2 - 4, ((94 + k1) - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1444 / 2) + 4); return; } else { class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method348(((94 + k1) - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1444 / 2) + 4, 16083, 83 - l1 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1445 / 2 - 4); return; Replace that with this:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method354(aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_1197, false, 83 - l1 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1445 / 2 - 4, ((94 + k1) - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1444 / 2) + 4); CustomMapback.method348(0, 16083, 0); return; } else { class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method348(((94 + k1) - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1444 / 2) + 4, 16083, 83 - l1 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1445 / 2 - 4); CustomMapback.method348(0, 16083, 0); return; And all you have to do is create a Pixelgrab for the Sprite in the sprite class (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)

[COLOR=Red]##[/COLOR][COLOR=YellowGreen][/COLOR][COLOR=Red]##[/COLOR][Edit][COLOR=Red]##[/COLOR][COLOR=YellowGreen][/COLOR][COLOR=Red]##[/COLOR]

Give me 10-20 Minutes, im going to release my Skinloading Class.[/QUOTE]

Rune~server wasn’t down I take no credits for that.

Read full topic
